name: Baobabs Mausoleum Ep. 2: 1313 Barnabas Dead End Drive
description: Baobabs Mausoleum™. The second episode mixing Monkey Island, Zelda Link´s Awakening DX with Twin Peaks and SpongeBob Squarepants. Welcome To the "open town" of Flamingo´s Creek: Population 64.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated with 128 MB RAM Storage: 4 GB available space
